```{r}
height <- c(30.7, 37.6,28.4,NA,33.2)
mass <- c(4, 5.2, 3.7 ,NA, 4.6)
pre_matrix <- c(height,mass)
samples <- c("plant1", "plant2", "plant3", "plant4", "plant5")
measured <- c("height", "mass")
matrix <- matrix(pre_matrix, nrow = 5)
colnames(matrix) <- measured
rownames(matrix) <- samples
means <- colMeans(matrix, na.rm=T)
final_matrix <- rbind(matrix, means)
final_matrix
```
